attributes.long-description:
MUD – FIM Motocross World Championship is the only game to exclusively include three official competitions: The MX1 and MX2 championships, and the epic 2011 Monster Energy FIM Motocross of Nations, which is a massive worldwide annual event that represents all of the leading riders, teams and motorbikes across the motocross world. The product boasts a brand new game engine, 12 Grand Prix races of the 2011 FIM Motocross World Championship season, the official track locations, and 3 huge arenas for freestyle stunts, featuring different terrain conditions that promise to deliver the most challenging and fulfilling motocross gaming experience. Play a pure, absolute Motocross and muddy Freestyle like never before!

1-2 players
350KB minimum save size
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
DUALSHOCK®3
Network Features
Network Players 2-12

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®3 systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account. 

MUD - FIM Motocross World Championship, 'MUD' is a registered trademark of Leader S.p.a. Published by Leader S.p.a., under its registered trademark 'Black Bean'.
An official product of the FIM Motocross World Championship, under license of Youthstream Group Lda. Developed by Milestone S.r.l. All Rights reserved. Manufacturers, bikes, names, brands and associated imagery featured in this game are trademarks and/or copyrighted materials of their respective owners. MX1® and MXoN® logos are trademarks of Youthstream Group Lda. MX-Life.TV® is a trademark of Youthstream Media s.a. All rights reserved.
